job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><em><u>******NO C2C/3RD PARTY, LOOKING FOR W2 CANDIDATES ONLY, must be able to work in the US without sponsorship now or in the future***</u></em></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Title: Software Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location: Burlingame, CA (Remote)</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: 6-12 Months</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Summary:</strong></p><p>Looking for software engineers to contribute towards adopting our libraries, build systems, and dependencies on a new (non-posix) operating system. Software engineers will work alongside our computer vision staff, using multiple repositories to fix build systems and dependencies to bring up a Computer Vision stack (SLAM).</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Responsibilities:</strong></p><p>• Integrate computer vision libraries to a new OS and identify and fix missing dependencies.</p><p>• Back propagate all changes in libraries to the main repository.</p><p>• Regularly report job progress to team management.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Skills:</strong></p><p>• Expertise in C++</p><p>• Design of portable libraries for Linux and Android.</p><p>• Strong knowledge of build systems. </p><p>• Knowledge of version control. </p><p>• Experience configuring, building, and testing libraries for Linux and Android.</p>
